zh.title: 以太坊/美元技术分析：[震荡整理，等待突破信号]
zh.content:
当前以太坊/美元（ETH/USD）价格位于1970.73美元，整体呈现震荡整理走势。近期价格区间在1956.18美元至1980美元之间波动，表明市场缺乏明确的趋势方向。投资者需关注突破该区间的信号来判断后市方向。

从技术指标来看，MACD值为-9.92438，表明市场目前处于一定的下行压力，但尚未形成强烈的卖盘信号。RSI（14）未提供数据，无法进一步分析超买或超卖情况。SMA（20）位于1970.41美元附近，价格接近该均线，显示市场短期内可能存在支撑。

支撑位方面，1956.18美元是近期的低点，若跌破该水平，可能会进一步回调至1900美元附近。阻力位在1980美元，若价格突破该位，则有望进一步挑战2000美元大关。当前价格接近均线，意味着可能出现短期反弹或继续整理。

交易建议方面，建议密切关注1956.18美元和1980美元的关键价格区间突破情况。如果价格突破1980美元，可以考虑轻仓多单；而若跌破1956.18美元，应考虑适时止损，防止进一步下行风险。

en.title: Ethereum vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
Ethereum is trading near 1,970.73, hovering almost exactly at its 20-period simple moving average around 1,970.41. This alignment suggests a short-term equilibrium between buyers and sellers. The modest 0.72% daily gain reflects mild bullish pressure, yet price remains confined within the 1,956–1,980 intraday range. Overall, the structure points to consolidation rather than a decisive trend, with momentum awaiting a catalyst for continuation or reversal.

The MACD reading at -9.92 indicates lingering bearish momentum on the broader timeframe, even as price attempts stabilization. A negative MACD typically reflects that the shorter-term average remains below the longer-term average, signaling underlying weakness. However, the narrowing daily range and price stabilization near the moving average could imply that downside momentum is fading. Without an RSI reading, momentum confirmation remains limited, increasing reliance on price structure.

Immediate resistance is seen near 1,980, the recent high. A sustained break above this level could open the path toward the psychological 2,000 mark, where profit-taking pressure may intensify. On the downside, 1,956 serves as initial support, followed by a stronger zone around 1,940 if selling accelerates. A decisive breakdown below 1,956 would likely confirm renewed bearish control and expose lower short-term liquidity pockets.

From a trading perspective, range strategies may remain effective while price holds between 1,956 and 1,980. Aggressive traders might consider buying near support with tight risk controls, targeting the upper boundary. A confirmed breakout above 1,980 with rising momentum could justify momentum-long positioning. Conversely, failure at resistance combined with expanding negative MACD pressure would favor short setups, particularly on a break beneath intraday support.
